title: Chair Cover
description: Throne seat brocaded with five five-clawed dragons in gold against a solid abckground of tight clouds in shades of blue, green, yellow, brown, peach, pink and rust color.  Border of blue satin brocaded with flowers in gold and shades of blue, green and yellow.  Border bound on both sides with black satin.  Brocade badly worn, and mended in spots.  lininf of gold colored satin.  Damask of cloud design.
creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
